items.title: valtterisa/valzu.js: Open-source Lightweight Javascript Framework

items.content_html: imgcompress is a lightweight, Dockerized image compression tool that converts HEIC from (iPhone Photos) and other photo formats to optimized JPEGs, resizes images for various use cases, and integrates seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines via a modern Web UI or CLI.
items.title: karimz1/imgcompress: imgcompress is a lightweight, Dockerized image compression tool that converts HEIC from (iPhone Photos) and other photo formats to optimized JPEGs, resizes images for various use cases, and integrates seamlessly into CI/CD pipelines via a modern Web UI or CLI.

items.title: omeryaldirgan/react-notify-pro: A lightweight, customizable, and animated notification system for React

items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.
items.title: n1ru4l/envelop: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Vanilla JS IPv4 input component with structured octet fields. Features paste handling, seamless form integration, error prevention, and get/set validations. Lightweight, modern-browser compatible, and degrades gracefully without JavaScript.
items.title: FcoMGX/IPv4-input-for-Web-Development: Vanilla JS IPv4 input component with structured octet fields. Features paste handling, seamless form integration, error prevention, and get/set validations. Lightweight, modern-browser compatible, and degrades gracefully without JavaScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.
items.title: react18-tools/react-webgl-trails: A lightweight WebGL-based React component for creating an interactive mouse trail effect. Works with Next.js out of the box.

items.content_html: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.jsâ€”no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.
items.title: rdmistra/selfhost-dl: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.jsâ€”no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.
